title: Criminal Case v2.5.3 [Unlimited Coins/Energy + More]

Criminal Case v2.5.3 [Unlimited Coins/Energy & More]

Overview: Join the Police of Grimsborough to solve a series of murder cases in this captivating hidden object, adventure game. Investigate crime scenes for clues, bring the suspects in for questioning and analyze evidence to catch the killers. Are you ready to prove your detective skills?
